title: Swimsuits With Shorts Are the Secret to Poolside Confidence This Summer
excerpt: I’ve rounded up the best swimsuits with shorts to rock this summer, from ﻿designer gems to ﻿Amazon deals﻿﻿.
text: Free People free-est Dixie Lurex Swim ShortieWith a bit of shimmer, this short set will make beach days look as glamorous as ever.Sizes: XS - XLColors: Fanta and Dolce De LeiteVintage GlamMontce Swim x Olivia Culpo Micro Biker Short This one gives Marilyn Monroe laughing among the waves, no? Sizes: XS-XLColors: Black Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowContrasting Stripes Bananhot Yuri Striped Bikini Bottoms If Stacy London taught me anything, it’s that vertical stripes elongate the body! Sizes: XS-XLColors: Multicolored Sexy Cut Montce Sydney Midi ShortSo you want shorts, but the exact opposite of board shorts? Something sexy? I have just the thing. Sizes: XS-XLColors: Oat, Teal Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowRelaxed Fit Hammies Cabana TrunksWill this be the summer of gingham or polka dots? (I choose both.) Sizes: 28-36Colors: Green Gingham, Red Gingham Customer review: “Nice fit. Very flattering.”High Luxury Loro Piana Bikini Bottoms Lavish your body in the finest of fabrics from Loro Piana. Sizes: 2-12Colors: Black Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowFrankies Bikinis x Bella Hadid Jolene Striped Rib Bikini TopAlthough they don’t offer much coverage, Frankies Bikinis does a great boyshort, too.Sizes: XS-XLColor: LassoRuched Skort Norma Kamali Diana Swim BottomsHave you heard about Norma Kamali’s weekly sale? It makes this option even more enticing. Sizes: XS-XLColors: BlackCustomer review: “Wish I could give it six stars! Stylish, fits well, neither too skimpy nor too matronly. I’ll feel good about wearing this.”Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowBalconette Top Dippin Daisy’s Luisa Textured Bottom Dippin Daisy’s is the brand for boyshort bikinis that come in fun colors and prints. Sizes: Baja Colors: XS-XL Zip Up Seafolly Beach Bound Boyshort One-Piece SwimsuitI learned the hard way that bikini tops are not meant for water slides. This suit could’ve made my 11th grade summer a lot less traumatizing. Sizes: 2-12 Colors: Black Customer review: “This is incredibly flattering. If you have a long torso, it still works (a rarity). It’s true to size with light support in the chest. Highly recommend.”Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowSporty Retro Aviator Nation 5-Stripe Flex Board ShortsThink: Your favorite running shorts, but waterproof. Sizes: XS-XLColors: 10 options Customer review: “I can’t tell you flattering these shorts are. I live in them. They look good with a sweatshirt, a T-shirt, or a bikini top!”Inclusive Sizing Hanna Nikole Plus Size Tankini Swimdress with BoyshortsIt shouldn’t be so hard to find the right mix of coverage, support, and style. Fortunately, this one has all three in spades. Sizes: 16-28 Colors: 10 options Customer review: “LOVE THIS! Fits great and flattering for plus size. Love the way the straps look while being really easy to tighten and loosen! Well made and feels great.”Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowBaywatch Vibes Vuori Shorty Swim Shorts To all my snorkelers, surfers, or beach volleyballers, this suit is up for anything. Sizes: S-XL Colors: Black, Red One Piece It’s Now Cool The Contour Surf OnesieFor a fun-filled beach day with minimal chances of a wardrobe malfunction, you’ve got to try a onesie. Sizes: XS-XLColors: Black, Magenta, Blue Breakers, Rich Mahogany Customer review: “Very cute and the deep scoop back is flattering. I love the color. Material is thick and supportive.” Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowWhy Trust ELLEEvery product featured on ELLE.com is independently researched, tested, or editor-approved. html:
Free People free-est Dixie Lurex Swim Shortie

With a bit of shimmer, this short set will make beach days look as glamorous as ever.

Sizes: XS - XL

Colors: Fanta and Dolce De Leite

Vintage Glam

Montce Swim x Olivia Culpo Micro Biker Short

This one gives Marilyn Monroe laughing among the waves, no?

Sizes: XS-XL

Colors: Black

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Contrasting Stripes

Bananhot Yuri Striped Bikini Bottoms

If Stacy London taught me anything, it’s that vertical stripes elongate the body!

Sizes: XS-XL

Colors: Multicolored

Sexy Cut

Montce Sydney Midi Short

So you want shorts, but the exact opposite of board shorts? Something sexy? I have just the thing.

Sizes: XS-XL

Colors: Oat, Teal

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Relaxed Fit

Hammies Cabana Trunks

Will this be the summer of gingham or polka dots? (I choose both.)

Sizes: 28-36

Colors: Green Gingham, Red Gingham

Customer review: “Nice fit. Very flattering.”

High Luxury

Loro Piana Bikini Bottoms

Lavish your body in the finest of fabrics from Loro Piana.

Sizes: 2-12

Colors: Black

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Frankies Bikinis x Bella Hadid Jolene Striped Rib Bikini Top

Although they don’t offer much coverage, Frankies Bikinis does a great boyshort, too.

Sizes: XS-XL

Color: Lasso

Ruched Skort

Norma Kamali Diana Swim Bottoms

Have you heard about Norma Kamali’s weekly sale? It makes this option even more enticing.

Sizes: XS-XL

Colors: Black

Customer review: “Wish I could give it six stars! Stylish, fits well, neither too skimpy nor too matronly. I’ll feel good about wearing this.”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Balconette Top

Dippin Daisy’s Luisa Textured Bottom

Dippin Daisy’s is the brand for boyshort bikinis that come in fun colors and prints.

Sizes: Baja

Colors: XS-XL

Zip Up

Seafolly Beach Bound Boyshort One-Piece Swimsuit

I learned the hard way that bikini tops are not meant for water slides. This suit could’ve made my 11th grade summer a lot less traumatizing.

Sizes: 2-12

Colors: Black

Customer review: “This is incredibly flattering. If you have a long torso, it still works (a rarity). It’s true to size with light support in the chest. Highly recommend.”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Sporty Retro

Aviator Nation 5-Stripe Flex Board Shorts

Think: Your favorite running shorts, but waterproof.

Sizes: XS-XL

Colors: 10 options

Customer review: “I can’t tell you flattering these shorts are. I live in them. They look good with a sweatshirt, a T-shirt, or a bikini top!”

Inclusive Sizing

Hanna Nikole Plus Size Tankini Swimdress with Boyshorts

It shouldn’t be so hard to find the right mix of coverage, support, and style. Fortunately, this one has all three in spades.

Sizes: 16-28

Colors: 10 options

Customer review: “LOVE THIS! Fits great and flattering for plus size. Love the way the straps look while being really easy to tighten and loosen! Well made and feels great.”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Baywatch Vibes

Vuori Shorty Swim Shorts

To all my snorkelers, surfers, or beach volleyballers, this suit is up for anything.

Sizes: S-XL

Colors: Black, Red

One Piece

It’s Now Cool The Contour Surf Onesie

For a fun-filled beach day with minimal chances of a wardrobe malfunction, you’ve got to try a onesie.

Sizes: XS-XL

Colors: Black, Magenta, Blue Breakers, Rich Mahogany

Customer review: “Very cute and the deep scoop back is flattering. I love the color. Material is thick and supportive.”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below
